summary: This document is email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York regarding a Daubert motion filing. The emails discuss proofreading, proposed redactions, and filing procedures for the motion and related exhibits.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender/recipient of the email correspondence regarding the Daubert motion filing procedures.

persons.name: Rocchio
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of witness preparation that one attorney is joining while passing work on the Daubert motion to another.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The prosecutor is involved in witness preparation for Rocchio, indicating Rocchio is likely a witness in the case.

events.title: Daubert motion preparation

keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively working on a Daubert motion in November 2021 related to the Epstein case.
The correspondence discusses whether to redact the filing and seal certain exhibits, including the defense expert notice and attached defense list of material.
Witness preparation was occurring simultaneously with motion preparation, specifically for a witness named Rocchio.
The document shows ongoing legal activity and coordination among prosecutors in the case years after Epstein's death.
